// RESTRICTED //
NO.CAS-8(4)/2013/DIV.-I(Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated:
/05/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.:05 /2013
Subject: Extension of already granted facility for access to the vehicle of His Holiness
Sri JayendraSaraswathySwamigal to take his vehicle up to the tarmac of
airports.
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. - 20/2012 dated 11/12/2012 on the
subject cited above.
2.
The competent authority has approved the extension of the facility of access of
the vehicle of his Holiness Sri JayendraSaraswathySwamigal upto the tarmac on
medical grounds at all airports in the country for a further period of one year w.e.f.
15/06/2013.
This issues with the approval of In-charge Commissioner of Security (Civil
Aviation).
(R.N Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf.
Copy to:
MCA (Shri U.K. Bhatia, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi: w.r.t. MCA letter no.
13024/39/2007-SS dated 21/05/2013.
